# thecloud_security_group_rule (Resource)

Security Group Rule resource allows you to manage specific firewall rules.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cidr` (String) The CIDR block for the rule.
- `direction` (String) The direction of traffic (ingress or egress).
- `protocol` (String) The protocol (tcp, udp, icmp, all).
- `security_group_id` (String) The ID of the security group to add this rule to.

### Optional

- `port_max` (Number) The maximum port number.
- `port_min` (Number) The minimum port number.
- `priority` (Number) The evaluation priority of the rule.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the security group rule.
